name: Silver OM
description:
This is a funky handmade sterling silver OM with a lot of positive energy.

This piece measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

*Available with a 16" or 18" black or brown leather necklace.

Each piece I make is made individually by hand with a lot of love, no two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Sterling Silver New Moon/Shield
description:
Part of my New Moon series this one features chunks of sterling silver wire and an abundance of sterling silver rivets, designed to create the feeling of ever expanding abundance. The other side features a sterling silver shield designed to let all positive energy through and keep all negative energy at bay.

This piece measures 1" in diameter and comes with a 18" black leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

name: Many Moons
description:
Many Moons is a beautiful double sided pendant with different moon images on either side. Handmade from copper with a sterling silver background, rivets and bail.

This piece measures 1" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

Each piece I make is done by hand, one at a time with love.

name: Skull with Wave and Moon
description:
Another beautiful Grateful Dead inspired piece. This one features an image of a wave and moon. If you love the ocean and the Dead then this is the pendant for you. 

Made from sterling silver with sterling silver rivets and one 14k gold rivet at the bottom to attract abundance and prosperity. 

This piece measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

Each piece I make is made individually by hand so no two pieces will look exactly alike.

*Available with a 16" or 18" black or brown leather necklace.

name: Mountains of the Moon
description:
This beautiful pendant is inspired by the Grateful Dead and love of the Mountains. Hand cut from sterling silver and riveted together with sterling silver rivets. This piece would make a great gift for yourself or someone you love.

Available with either a full moon or crescent moon. (see photos)

This pendant measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace and custom gift box.

Each piece is individually made to order, no two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Skull and Ski Turn
description:
This one was inspired by a great friend of mine. If you love the Grateful Dead and love to ski then this is the pendant for you! This one is all hand cut from sterling silver and is riveted together with sterling silver rivets.

This piece measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" black leather necklace with sterling silver clasp and a custom gift box.

name: First Show Piece
description:
The First Show Piece is a great way to commemorate you first Dead show. This is a double sided piece with the date and venue of your first show stamped into the back.

Each piece is made with love from three layers of sterling silver, copper and brass and is held together with eight brass rivets. This pendant measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace and custom gift box.

Please note that there is limited space in which to stamp venue names and dates so I will do my best to accommodate all requests.

When you order please email your venue and date information to:
metalrockdesigns@gmail.com

name: Silver OM/Lotus
description:
OMG! it's a really cool OM! You love this pendant and you know it. Handmade from sterling silver this pendant features an OM symbol on one side and a Lotus symbol on the other side. Held together seven silver rivets and one 14k gold rivet to attract abundance and prosperity.

This pendant measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" black leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

* Also available with a 16" or 18" black or brown leather necklace.

name: Large Copper Wave and Moon
description:
This is a really super cool, unique pendant. Hand cut from copper and brass with sterling silver wave an moon accents, rivets and bail.

The image represents the power and connection of the ocean waves and the moon and is flowing with positive energy!

This piece measures 1 5/8" in diameter and comes with a 16" thick, brown, braided leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and a custom gift box.

name: New Moon Bursting with Gold
description:
Another unique pendant in my new moon series. This one features a new moon image filled with chunks of 14k gold wire surrounded by 14k gold rivets. The other side features my favorite Sun image with eight 14k gold rivets. I used three thick layers of sterling silver for this pendant, along with the 14k gold rivets this creates a feeling of abundance and prosperity.

This pendant measures 1" in diameter and comes with a 18" black leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

name: Large Double Sided OM/Lotus
description:
This is a truly beautiful, stunning, badass pendant! Part of my new extra large series of handmade pendants, this piece measures 2 1/4" in diameter. 

One side features the meditative OM symbol surrounded by waves of positive energy. The other side features a Sun inside of a Lotus image.

Handmade from copper and brass with sterling silver rivets and bail.

This piece comes with a 16" thick, brown, braided leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

name: Sterling Silver Earrings with Sterling Silver Rivets
description:
These are beautiful earrings that are designed to make you feel happy!

Made from thick sterling silver wire hammered flat with three sterling silver rivets. Every piece of jewelry I make is done by hand and is as unique as the person who wears it.

These earrings measure approximately 2 1/2" and have surgical steel ear wire. They will come delivered to you in a custom jewelry box with a polishing cloth.

name: Sterling Silver Earrings with 14k Rose Gold Rivets
description:
These beautiful handmade earrings are made from thick sterling silver wire hammered flat and are highlighted with three 14k rose gold rivets.

These earrings measure approximately 2 3/4" in length and have surgical steel ear wire.

Each piece I make is done by hand, each piece is unique and one of a kind.

name: Mixed Metal Double Sided Peace Pendant
description:
You wanna peace of this?  Another really cool handmade, double sided, mixed metal pendant. This one is constructed from two layers of copper with a layer of brass sandwiched in between. This piece is held together with eight sterling silver rivets and has a sterling silver bail.

This pendant measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

* Also available with a 16" necklace.

name: New Moon #9
description:
Another really cool piece from my New Moon series. This beautiful hand made pendant has an abalone New Moon on one side and a Tree of Live in the other side. Made from sterling silver and brass and held together with eight rivets, seven are sterling silver and one 14k rose gold rivet to attract abundance and prosperity.

This piece measures 1" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

name: Large Double Sided Tree of Life Moon/Star
description:
This is a really powerful piece! Designed to help your positive thoughts blossom. The Tree of Life and Shooting Star/Moon are hand cut from copper, the middle background layer is brass and the rivets and bail are sterling silver. A beautiful combination of metals. 

This piece measures 1 1/4" in diameter and comes complete with an 18" brown leather necklace and custom gift box.

Each piece is made by hand, with love. No two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Sun Bolt
description:
This one is super cool! The Sun Bolt pendant is made from a combination of sterling silver, copper and brass. The powerful sun design amplifies the positive energy of the lightning bolt bringing good vibes to all!

This handmade pendant measures 1 1/2" in diameter and comes with an 18" leather necklace and custom gift box.

Each piece is made by hand, with love. No two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Silver Wave and Moon
description:
This is a beautiful representation of the powerful connection between the ocean and the moon. All sterling silver and filled with love!

This handmade piece measures 1" in diameter and comes with a 18" black leather necklace.

Each piece is made by hand, with love. No two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Medium Double Sided Swirl Sun/Star and Moon
description:
This is a really great pendant full of great vibes. This double sided pendant has my popular swirl sun design on one side and a shooting star, crescent moon on the other side. Both images are hand cut from sterling silver with a brass background.

This piece measures about 1" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

name: 3 Layer Mt
description:
Do you love the mountains and the ocean? This beautiful pendant is made with two layers of sterling silver and a copper accent ring. This piece is approximately 1 1/8 in. in diameter and comes finished with an 18" black leather necklace.

Please note that each piece is made individually by hand, with love, so no two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Large Double Sided Tree of Life/Sun
description:
This double sided pendant has a lot of positive energy! Hand cut and constructed from three layers of sterling silver and sterling silver rivets. The beautiful Tree of Life is full of abundance and grows with the radiance of the Sun.

This piece measures 1 1/8" in diameter and comes with an 18" black leather necklace with a sterling silver clasp and custom gift box.

name: Large Double Sided Sun Star/Moon
description:
This beautiful pendant is hand made from three layers of sterling silver and is held together with eight sterling silver rivets. Full of positive energy and good vibes!

This pendant measures 1 1/4" in diameter and comes complete with an 18" leather necklace and custom gift box.

Please note that each piece is made individually by hand, with love, so no two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Large Double Sided Mt/Wave Sun
description:
If you love the mountains, ocean and the sun then this is the piece for you. This double sided pendant is hand cut from sterling silver with a copper back ground and is held together with eight sterling silver rivets.  This one is so full of good vibes you wont stop smiling for a long time :)

This piece measures 1 1/4" in diameter and comes with an 18" leather necklace and custom gift box.

Please note that each piece is made individually by hand, with love, so no two pieces will look exactly alike.

name: Official Telluride Blues and Brews Pendant
description:
The Official Telluride Blues and Brews Pendant (Also available at www.tellurideblues.com). Made from double layers of brass and copper with sterling silver accents. Choose between a Sun or Mountain design.

This pendant is 1 1/4" in diameter and comes with an 18" brown necklace.
